pages.text: The $(item)Rune of The Orb$() increases the capacity of the $(item)Blood Orb$() that is inside of the Altar by +2% additively per rune while it is inside of the Altar.

With some $(item)Netherite Scrap$() and some $(item)Intricate Hellforged Parts$() looted from the $(l:neovitae:dungeons/endless_realm)Demon Realm$(), you can double the power of your $(item)Rune of the Orb$(), increasing the orb's capacity by an additive +4% per rune.
If you change your mind, you can undo the recipe in the ARC.
